wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Walton (8 January 1881 – 1962) was an English professional footballer who played for Preston North End, Tottenham Hotspur, Sheffield United and Stalybridge Celtic.

response: *Joe Walton (1935–2021), coach in college and professional American football
